pudgalayekuta widesha gathawima sandaha nithi wirodhi lesa wisa labadima sambandhawa danduwam niyamawa siti malala kridika lalana shanthi ayirangani janadhipathithumage samawa matha kolambaa kotuwa mahesthrath lanka jayarathna menewiya eeye (29) nidahas kalaya.malala kridikawa chodanawanta warada piliganimen pasu 2009.04.02 dina kolambaa kotuwa mahesthrath gihan pilapitiya mahatha wisin rupiyal lakshayaka dada mudalak ha wasara dahayakata athhita wu wasaraka sira danduwamak niyama kara thibuni.muslim jathikayakuge biriya lesa peni sita ohuta brithanya maha komasaris karyalayen wyaja lesa wisa labaganimata sahaya wi widesha gatha karawima sambandhawa aagamika ha wigamika panatha yatathe me malala kridikawata wiruddhawa kolambaa aparadha kottasaya magin chodana gonu kara thibuni.chuditha kala waradata pasuthawena bawath min idiriyata kisidu waradak sidu nokota yahapath jiwithayak gatha kirimata adhishtana karagena athi bawath maya malala krida anshayen shri lankawata kirthiyak labadun thanaththiyak bawath danduwam niyama kirimata pera malala kridikawa wenuwen peni siti nithignyawaraya adhikaranayata karunu dakwamin pawasa thibuni.chuditha malala kridikawata awama danduwamak niyama kirima yogya bawata nigamanaya kala mahesthrathwaraya ihatha danduwama niyama kara thibuni.ema danduwama panawimen pasu thamata samawak labadena lesata janadhipathithumagen malala kridikawa ayadimak kara thibuni.ee anuwa malala kridikawata aandukrama wyawasthawe 34 wana wyawasthawa prakarawa janadhipathithuma wisin samawa pradanaya kara athi bawa rajya aarakshaka amathyanshayen nikuth kala lipiyehi pitapathak adhikaranayata idiripath karamin adhikarana amathyanshayen danwa athi bawa prakasha kala mahesthrathwariya chodana laba siti malala kridikawa eeye (29) nidahas kalaya..
ee anuwa eya yali kabinettuwata genawith sammatha kirimata yam kalayak gathawanu athi bawa anumana kala hakiyi .
